title: The Induction Series-Mentors-Conspiracy Researchers
description:
Mentors DVD-ROM [On The Path of Knowledge] 

We are all travelers on the path knowledge, as our understanding grows over time. As we move along the path we meet many travelers, some of which become Mentors who share their experiences and help us explore the unknown. 
They have the power of speech, broadcasting into the airwaves, leaving behind a wealth of words which we can gather together and share. 

To this end, I have compiled almost 300 hours of my favorite talks with mentors whose words and research continue to effect my beliefs to this day. They are not authorities, but researchers on the path of knowledge, just as we are.

This disc is part of the Induction series. Because I said so. Now enjoy and copy freely.

UPDATE: Made some final revisions, corrections and updates to the Mentors DVD-ROM. Radio Shows sections and new files added below.
